a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cancer death rate in children under 5 years old by type, World
Estimated number of cancer-related deaths among children under 5 years old, categorized by cancer type, per
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Only cancer types with a global death rate above 0.1 in the relevant age group for the latest available year are shown.
